name: pastMeetingDetails
description:
Get details on a past meeting.

**Scopes:** `meeting:read:admin` `meeting:read` **[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `Light` > **Note**: Please double encode your UUID when using this API if the UUID begins with a '/'or contains '//' in it.

meetingUUID.description: The meeting UUID. Each meeting instance will generate its own Meeting UUID (i.e., after a meeting ends, a new UUID will be generated for the next instance of the meeting). Please double encode your UUID when using it for other API calls if the UUID begins with a '/'or contains '//' in it.

$ul: **id**: [Meeting ID](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/201362373-What-is-a-Meeting-ID-): Unique identifier of the meeting in "**long**" format(represented as int64 data type in JSON), also known as the meeting number.
**total_minutes**: Sum of meeting minutes from all participants in the meeting.
